caseSubject: Suit for specific performance/Agreement to sell
caseTitle: Khudadad v. Syed Ghazanfar Ali Shah @ S.Inaam Hussain and others
tagline: (1) Implication of Article 113 of the Limitation Act. (2) Effect of Section 44 of the Transfer of Property Act on an agreement by the co-sharer. (3) Proof of handwriting/signature under Article 84 of Qanun-e-Shahadat Order, 1984. (4) Power of Appellate Court under Section 107 C.P.C. (5) Niceties of Article 79 of the Qanun-e-Shahadat Order 1984 for proof of document.
